name: Ragtag Adventurers
description: Ragtag Adventurers is a boss rush game that pits 4 heroes against terrible monsters in Shared Screen Multiplayer. Play alone or with friends against challenging bosses that will put your skills to the test.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 / AMD R7 250 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
